CustomField.formula: IF(OR(Opportunity.RecordTypeId = '01240000000M58N', Opportunity.RecordTypeId = '01240000000M58I', Opportunity.RecordTypeId = '01240000000M58S', Opportunity.RecordTypeId = '01240000000M8Iw', Opportunity.RecordTypeId = '01240000000M8J1', Opportunity.RecordTypeId = '01240000000MDU9', Opportunity.RecordTypeId = '012180000000h39', Opportunity.RecordTypeId = '012180000000h3E', Opportunity.RecordTypeId = '0120b000000ExDL', Opportunity.RecordTypeId = '0120b000000ExDG', Opportunity.RecordTypeId = '0125a000000QkXG', Opportunity.RecordTypeId = '0120v000000op3S'), IF(Opportunity.CloseDate < DATE(2015, 11, 25), ROUND( ROUND((UnitPrice * IF(OR(ISNULL(Tipo_de_cambio__c),Tipo_de_cambio__c = 0), 1, Tipo_de_cambio__c)), 2) * Quantity,2), UnitPrice * IF(OR(ISNULL(Tipo_de_cambio__c),Tipo_de_cambio__c = 0), IF(OR(ISNULL(Tipo_de_cambio__c),Tipo_de_cambio__c = 0), 1, Tipo_de_cambio__c), Tipo_de_cambio__c) * Quantity) * IF(OR(Opportunity.RecordTypeId = '01240000000M8J1', Opportunity.RecordTypeId = '01240000000M8Iw', Opportunity.RecordTypeId = '01240000000MDU9'), -1, 1) ,0)
CustomField.label: Pre√ßo total estimado
